Package org.agilewiki.jactor2.core.blades

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    AsyncAgent<RESPONSE_TYPE> Deprecated
    Blade
    Blades must implement the Blade interface to provide access to their targetReactor.
    ExceptionHandler<RESPONSE_TYPE>
    Exception handlers are used to alter how exceptions are processed.
    SyncAgent<RESPONSE_TYPE> Deprecated
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AsyncAgentBase<RESPONSE_TYPE,BLADE_TYPE extends Blade> Deprecated
    BladeBase
    BladeBase is a convenience class that implements an Blade.
    FacilityAgent<RESPONSE_TYPE>
    A convenience class for implementing facility agents.
    IsolationBlade
    An isolation blade processes requests from other blades one at a time, starting a new request only when a result is returned for the previous one.
    NonBlockingBlade
    A blade which does not perform long computations nor otherwise block the thread.
    SyncAgentBase<RESPONSE_TYPE,BLADE_TYPE extends Blade> Deprecated
